ValidationRule.description: Prevents an invalid Billing Schedule from being selected.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND(Quote_Business_Group__c="Barracuda", TEXT(Billing_Schedule__c)="Annual" || TEXT(Billing_Schedule__c)="Monthly"), AND(Quote_Business_Group__c="Sonian", TEXT(Billing_Schedule__c)="Special Billing Schedule Request"), AND(Quote_Business_Group__c="Barracuda MSP", TEXT(Billing_Schedule__c)="Annual" || TEXT(Billing_Schedule__c)="Special Billing Schedule Request") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select a valid Billing Schedule based on these options: -Core: Special Request or blank value -MSP: Monthly -Sonian: Monthly or Annual
